source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select
	c.FirstName+' '+c.LastName+' bought '+p.Name+' from '+
	c.SalesPerson+' worth '+cast(so.LineTotal as nvarchar)
from
	[SalesLT].[SalesOrderDetail] so join [SalesLT].[SalesOrderHeader] sh
	on sh.salesorderid = so.salesorderid
	join [SalesLT].[Product] p on so.productid = p.productid
	join [SalesLT].[Customer] c on c.customerid = sh.customerid

Select distinct
	month(ModifiedDate) as month,
	year(ModifiedDate) as year,
	day(ModifiedDate) as day,
	ModifiedDate
from
	SalesLT.SalesOrderDetail

sqlReaderQuery.value:
Select
	SalesOrderID, SalesOrderDetailID, OrderQty, ProductID, UnitPrice, LineTotal
from
	SalesLT.SalesOrderDetail
where
	ModifiedDate = '@{item().ModifiedDate}'

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 split(Color=='Red',
	Color=='Black',
	Color=='White',
	Color=='Blue',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitOnColor@(Red, Black, White, Blue, Others)
ConditionalSplitOnColor@Red sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Red'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Red
ConditionalSplitOnColor@Black sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Black'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Black
ConditionalSplitOnColor@White sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['White'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> White
ConditionalSplitOnColor@Blue sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Blue'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Blue
ConditionalSplitOnColor@Others sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Others'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Others

source(output(
		BusinessEntityID as integer,
		QuotaDate as timestamp,
		SalesQuota as decimal(19,4),
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		BusinessEntityID as integer,
		PersonType as string,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		EmailPromotion as integer,
		AdditionalContactInfo as string,
		Demographics as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1 aggregate(groupBy(BusinessEntityID),
	Sum_of_Sales = sum(SalesQuota)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1, source2 join(Aggregate1@BusinessEntityID == source2@BusinessEntityID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		BusinessEntityID = Aggregate1@BusinessEntityID,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		Sum_of_Sales
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SalesLT
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCustomer
SalesLT derive(CreatedHash = sha1(FirstName+LastName+CompanyName)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, DimCustomer exists(CreatedHash == HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, DimCustomer lookup(SalesLT@CustomerID == DimCustomer@CustomerID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(InsertedDate = iif(isNull(InsertedDate), currentTimestamp(), InsertedDate),
		UpdatedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['CustomerID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SalesLT@CustomerID,
		Title = SalesLT@Title,
		FirstName = SalesLT@FirstName,
		MiddleName = SalesLT@MiddleName,
		LastName = SalesLT@LastName,
		InsertedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		HashKey = CreatedHash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SalesLTProduct
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimProduct
SalesLTProduct derive(CreatedHash = sha1(Name+ProductNumber+Color)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, DimProduct exists(CreatedHash == HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, DimProduct lookup(SalesLTProduct@ProductID == DimProduct@ProductID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(InsertedDate = iif(isNull(InsertedDate), currentTimestamp(), InsertedDate),
		UpdatedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ProductID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProductID = SalesLTProduct@ProductID,
		Name = SalesLTProduct@Name,
		ProductNumber = SalesLTProduct@ProductNumber,
		Color = SalesLTProduct@Color,
		InsertedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		HashKey = CreatedHash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
